hero.title: Built to save your time and effort.
hero.subtitle: Teevent is the best place to order custom lanyards.
hero.seePriceInstantly: See price instantly. No sign-up needed.

trustBar.statement: {{number}} lanyards delivered. Quality trusted by event organizers.

features.feature1: No more "Contact for quotation," slow replies, or pushy sales chats. Input your quantity and see the exact price instantly.
features.feature2: No more complex Adobe AI/PS files. Use our one-click Canva template and design easily.
features.feature3: No more lost order details in messy WhatsApp chats. Track your order status with one Order ID in one place.

pricingPreview.errorMinQuantity: Enter a quantity of at least 50 pieces to see pricing.
pricingPreview.errorRange: Enter a quantity of 50-599 pieces to see pricing.

canvaPreview.title: Use our template.
canvaPreview.subtitle: Design directly in our template to avoid misalignment.

testimonials.title: The new way to make custom lanyards.
testimonials.testimonial1: I find Teevent fast, accurate, and very trustworthy.
testimonials.testimonial1Author: Organizer, The Santa Village Event, UTAR
testimonials.testimonial2: As an introvert, I like it better than the old way! The Teevent website has every information I need... I don't have to ask and wait for the answer. Truly time-efficient and introvert-friendly.

simplicity.title: It's easy.
simplicity.step1: Tell us how many you need.

sample.title: Try it in your hands first.
sample.subtitle2: We send you a lanyard sample. Free.

finalCTA.title: Stop chasing suppliers for quotes.
finalCTA.subtitle: Check if we fit your budget instantly. No sign-up needed.
